name: Backpacker's Pantry Peanut Butter & Raisin Oatmeal
description:
Hearty rolled oats with just the right amount of peanut butter, and a sprinkling of organic raisins and a touch of cinnamon, its like the cereal version of a delicious cookie. Redefine your idea of instant oats in the backcountry.Ingredients: instant rolled oats, peanut butter (peanuts, cane sugar, palm oil, salt), organic cane sugar, organic raisins (organic vegetable oil), sea salt, organic cinnamon.Allergens: contains oats and peanuts.
